name: Smartwool Athletic Light Elite Stripe Crew Socks 2 Pack - Unisex
categories: Athletic Light Elite Stripe Crew Socks 2 Pack
description: Retro athletic look meets modern merino technology. The thin cushioning and reinforced sole keep your feet happy, wear after wear. Doing back-to-back workout days? This pack comes with 2 pairs so you can wear a fresh one while the other is in the wash.Made of merino, nylon and elastane.2-Degree fit keeps sock in place.Light Elite cushioning for shock absorption in targeted zones.Flat knit toe seam for an irritation-free wear.Comes with 2 pairs of socks.
